ValidationRule.description: If ‘Closure Code’ starts with ‘Paid’, Penalty & Interest Paid field must equal Penalty & Interest Assessed field AND the Penalty & Interest Recovered field must be null or zero.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), ( BEGINS(TEXT(Closure_Code__c),'Paid') ), ( ( Penalty_Interest_Paid__c <> Penalty_Interest_Assessed__c) || ( Penalty_Interest_Recovered__c > 0.00) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Closure Code starts with Paid, then the Penalty & Interest Paid field must equal the Penalty & Interest Assessed field, and the Penalty & Interest Recovered field must be null or zero.
